tool_description: Monitors and validates environmental conditions (temperature, humidity, atmospheric pressure) during calibration procedures to ensure measurements meet specified tolerances.

temperature_target.description: Target temperature in Celsius for calibration environment

monitoring_duration.description: Duration to monitor conditions in minutes

error_messages: Temperature out of range: Current temperature exceeds specified tolerance limits. Wait for stabilization or adjust climate control.
Humidity out of range: Current humidity exceeds specified tolerance limits. Use dehumidifier/humidifier as needed.
Pressure variation detected: Atmospheric pressure changes may affect measurements. Consider barometric correction.
Monitoring duration too short: Extend monitoring period to ensure environmental stability.
Invalid tolerance values: Temperature and humidity tolerances must be positive numbers.
usage: Set target temperature, humidity, and monitoring duration. Tool continuously monitors conditions and validates they remain within tolerance throughout the specified duration.
